name: Basilisk (FaerieFire)
description:
Basilisk A Game By Jade Britzman With Music Produced by Jamie Serlin

A short walking simulator about a megastructure.
You are a pilgrim, one of many who have made their way to this abandoned tower.

Seek the stone pilgrims that litter the great halls of this ancient place. Listen to their final thoughts.

You will join them.

And you will find peace

===================================

The mac build hasn't been tested. Hopefully it works
